Clipboard contents: Fonts menu Copied to clipboard Word correction before dictionary This option allows you to correct shortened words, before it will be sent to dictionary application, e.g. when you select \"l\'homme\" - it will be transformed to \"homme\", etc. Save bookmark (last selection) Save user dictionary entry (last selection) Toggle dictionary button action - short/long tap There are two different actions on a \'dictionary\' button on \'selection toolbar\' (when you select text while reading) - fired by short and long taps. This option allows to swap them. User dic / cites / search history Citations Page Book All Delete this dictionary entry? User dictionary panel User dictionary is a small panel under book page that shows up to 10 words (that were saved before with its translations), containing on the current page Use | for unnessary ending, ~ for split variants of the word Reader toolbar buttons Find: Whole drive In current folder Open book from Google One Cloud - open/save book Link to bookmark extension org.coolreader.docx is not installed, install it to open docx format Opened previously converted copy of document KnownReader could try to convert document in html format, then open it. If necessary, allows you to select a language other than the language installed in the system (System is selected by default) Selecting the appearance of the menu and settings from several options (Black, White, Dark, Light, etc.) Allows you not to refresh the page completely (when open dialogs, keyboard, etc) to avoid text reformatting Forcing the screen backlight time 2-6 minutes, or according to the system settings (selected by default) Forcing the screen brightness to be set to 1-100%, or according to the system settings (selected by default) If the motion sensor does not fix the activity, then the reading aloud stops after a selected time period of 1-100 minutes, disabled by default Forced off the backlight of control buttons (if there are separate ones) for more comfortable reading Display of icons before menu items (when disabled - just title) Show book covers along with titles Selecting the display size of the book cover (Small, Medium, Large) Retrieve information about books in the selected folder (author, genre, year of publication, etc.) Hide folders that do not contain books This option disables the display of covers and other information of books in folders The reading position will be saved every 1-100 minutes on the cloud storage, disabled by default (requires account permission for access) The reading position will be saved to local file on this device Assign actions for buttons and behavior when connecting a headset Customize the actions of the program when you tap the screen area (screen is divided to 9 tap zones 3x3) Setting up an additional action for long or short press Select text when double-tapping on the screen (for copying, saving bookmark, call the dictionary, sending, etc) Page flipping with volume buttons Select the pressed place on the screen with the rectangle Disabling the trackball to prevent accidental page flipping (example: HTC A8181) Slide your finger up or down to increase or decrease the brightness (Disable, Left edge, Right edge). For EINK devices with double light (cold and warm) - both sides will be used. To flip pages with gestures (Disabled, 1-20 pages), default 1 page (from right to left) Set an action that fired when selecting a word The action, that fired when selecting several words Keep the selection after calling the dictionary app If enabled - filling the screen with entire page Selecting the position of the toolbar on the screen If selected, the toolbar is hidden Panel size, shadowing, inversion of icons Selecting the buttons displayed on the toolbar Paging, Scrolling Adjust the orientation of the page on the screen The number of pages displayed in landscape mode (one, two) Selecting the reading mode day or night Selecting the color of the text Background color selection Select a texture (picture) instead of a solid color. You can add a texture by sending it to KnownReader from image viewing software. KnownReader project is a fork of known reader application - CoolReader. KnownReader offers rich UI and number of unique features. Farm-Fresh icon set from http://www.fatcow.com/free-icons Book was already downloaded, open it instead of new download? Could not find local file, showing OPDS entry Force TTS restart koef When TTS engine is unexpectedly stopped by system, application will try to force restart TTS. Higher value means more timeout to wait disable orientation panel 1 sec 3 sec 5 sec 10 sec 15 sec 20 sec 30 sec Orientation panel appears when you rotating your device, showing additional options (return, fix orientation) Database is corrupted Database is restored from backup Performed delete: Performed rename: Need authorization Input token / URL Delete token file Success Unsuccess Cannot finish this action - web browser is not installed. You can open this window later via long tap on Dropbox icon. Select an action: Authorize in Dropbox Auto mode Manual token input Previous authorization Dropbox: authorization finished successfully Dropbox: authorization error Paste token / URL here Authorize in Yandex Yandex disc: authorization finished successfully Yandex disc: authorization error You can open this window later via long tap on Yandex icon. Select an action: You can open this window later via long tap on Litres icon Litres: authorization finished successfully Enter login and password Auto mode Manual token input Input token / URL Delete token file Paste token / URL here Previous authorization Open as plain text? In headphones in transport Settings Off Allows to show popup window informing about transport stops and metro stations nearby Off Show metro stations nearby Only in Moscow, St.Petersburg, Ekaterinburg and Novosibirsk Show transport stops Only in Moscow Show both Location permission Location permission is required, grant? Ok High-contrast icons based on Tango Icon Library: http://tango.freedesktop.org/Tango_Icon_Library. document will be converted to plain text Document conversion needed Toolbar Toolbar settings Cloud settings Dictionary settings Library and file browser settings Rare and experimental settings Text-to-speech settings Screen and keys backlight settings Special selection modes\' settings Page view mode, orientation and animation Separate selection settings for \'Selection mode\' and \'Inspector mode\' Colors and night mode settings Page and screen margins settings Yandex disc settings Open Yandex disc settings dialog Dropbox settings Open Dropbox settings dialog Cloud syncronization variant Disabled Via filesystem Via Yandex disc Cloud syncronization is disabled Syncronization will be done via local filesystem - you need to use external tool to sync cr3e/cloudsync folder across devices Syncronization will be done via Yandex disc (folder KnownReader is used) Profile switching is enabled only when book is open Global settings are italic (other - depends on profile) Screen margin (restart needed) For touchscreen devices with skirtings From language (1) To language (2) Select Specify book\'s translation direction, e.g. ru or zh-cn Translation direction Profile Rename profile New profile name No bookmarks in this book Rendering preset Legacy Flat Book Web (full) DOM version compatibility level Legacy Newest Item tap action Item long tap action Book info Open book Edit book info Menu from current device Saved position found (in cloud) Restore Open saved position list Cancel now you at Calculate statistics Translated with «Yandex.Translate» Language(s) not set (translate directions) Language(s) codes not found (translate directions) Translate whole page Settings were saved No files found Yandex Translate languages Lingvo Online languages Vice versa Current dictionary are invalid! Set up the dictionary Upload complete! KnownReader - more than just reader. This e-book reading application has grown up from CoolReader project. We put a soul in it and added the important things - for us and for you: changed navigation, UI, extended dictionary, cloud features and much more. We thank CoolReader\'s original author and all the contributors, but now we begin our own way in PlayMarket. If you like our application and you want to support us, you can do this in the following ways: 1. Contribute at: https://knownreader.com/contribute 2. Write us on 4pda forum: https://4pda.ru/forum/index.php?showuser=246075 With the help of code examples from projects (dic popup windows, shortcuts, intents): FBReader, Librera, AlReader, PocketBook, Koreader Chose background pic / texture This feature is availble in Premium version only This feature is availble in Premium version only yes no Document properties Internal styles (colors, margins, background, etc) (You may need to disable it when night mode is on) Embedded fonts (which override selected) Text autoformat Change ... You always can do it later - in CSS settings tab # - auto (Yandex online only) Archive contains new fonts (%1$s). Copy them to fonts folder? Fonts copied: %1$s. Restart app to use them (or reboot may needed). Delete font / font family? (Non-system fonts not found). Cannot delete Font files deleted: %1$s of %2$s Font files deleted Delete background file? Background file deleted... Stop TTS after %1$s min Device is still, decrease volume from %1$s to %2$s Device is still still :), good night! Library maintenance Remove books\' info, that are not reside into favorite (and Books) folders Remove books\' info, that are not reside into favorite, Books and ExtSD folders Real files will NOT be deleted from your device, there will be removed only information in the internal KnownReader database. You can easily rescan library later (NB: bookmarks of these items will also be removed). Operation performed. It is recommended to restart app Show statistics It can be useful to make backup of cr3e folder (in the Internal storage) before manipulations with database - this way you could rollback database to previous state New books Popular books Data is loading...
